ivardefs.name: about_
ivardefs.desc: Other resources that pertain to this communication request and to which this communication request should be associated.

ivardefs.name: authoredOn
ivardefs.desc: For draft requests, indicates the date of initial creation.  For requests with other statuses, indicates the date of activation.

ivardefs.name: basedOn_
ivardefs.desc: A plan or proposal that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this request.

ivardefs.name: category_
ivardefs.desc: The type of message to be sent such as alert, notification, reminder, instruction, etc.

ivardefs.name: doNotPerform
ivardefs.desc: If true indicates that the CommunicationRequest is asking for the specified action to *not* occur.

ivardefs.name: encounter
ivardefs.desc: The Encounter during which this CommunicationRequest was created or to which the creation of this record is tightly associated.

ivardefs.name: groupIdentifier
ivardefs.desc: A shared identifier common to all requests that were authorized more or less simultaneously by a single author, representing the identifier of the requisition, prescription or similar form.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: Business identifiers assigned to this communication request by the performer or other systems which remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

ivardefs.name: informationProvider_
ivardefs.desc: The entity (e.g. person, organization, clinical information system, or device) which is to be the source of the communication.

ivardefs.name: medium_
ivardefs.desc: A channel that was used for this communication (e.g. email, fax).

ivardefs.name: note_
ivardefs.desc: Comments made about the request by the requester, sender, recipient, subject or other participants.

ivardefs.name: payload_
ivardefs.desc: Text, attachment(s), or resource(s) to be communicated to the recipient.

ivardefs.name: priority
ivardefs.desc: Characterizes how quickly the proposed act must be initiated. Includes concepts such as stat, urgent, routine.

ivardefs.name: reasonCode_
ivardefs.desc: Describes why the request is being made in coded or textual form.

ivardefs.name: reasonReference_
ivardefs.desc: Indicates another resource whose existence justifies this request.

ivardefs.name: recipient_
ivardefs.desc: The entity (e.g. person, organization, clinical information system, device, group, or care team) which is the intended target of the communication.

ivardefs.name: replaces_
ivardefs.desc: Completed or terminated request(s) whose function is taken by this new request.

ivardefs.name: requester
ivardefs.desc: The device, individual, or organization who asks for the information to be shared.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The status of the proposal or order.

ivardefs.name: statusReason
ivardefs.desc: Captures the reason for the current state of the CommunicationRequest.

ivardefs.name: subject
ivardefs.desc: The patient or group that is the focus of this communication request.

properties.desc: A request to convey information; e.g. the CDS system proposes that an alert be sent to a responsible provider, the CDS system proposes that the public health agency be notified about a reportable condition.
